Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: C5 levels of other family members were either normal or approximately half - normal , consistent with autosomal codominant inheritance of the gene determining C5 deficiency .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| C5 deficiency |
| Autosomal codominant inheritance |

Note: "C5 deficiency" is a disease entity in the paragraph, and "autosomal codominant inheritance" is a genetic concept that is related to the inheritance pattern of the disease, but it is not a disease entity itself.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| C5 deficiency |

The entity "autosomal codominant inheritance" does not clearly refer to a disease, it's a genetic concept, so it was removed from the list.
